import React from 'react' import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../../store/cart-context' const MealItem = (props) => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) const price = `₹${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const addItemToCarthandler = amount => { } return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem
